inventory=[{"type": "black_concrete", "quantity": 58, "index": 13}, {"type": "golden_apple", "quantity": 21, "index": 15}, {"type": "crimson_button", "quantity": 16, "index": 22}, {"type": "leather", "quantity": 7, "index": 24}, {"type": "smooth_red_sandstone", "quantity": 53, "index": 31}, {"type": "pink_dye", "quantity": 20, "index": 33}, {"type": "birch_sapling", "quantity": 42, "index": 36}, {"type": "tube_coral_fan", "quantity": 24, "index": 37}, {"type": "golden_hoe", "quantity": 1, "index": 38}]

thought: I want to craft leather_leggings. Leather_leggings require three leather on top of each other and two more leather on the sides of the middle row. I will start by moving one leather to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 24 to slot 1 with quantity 1
